subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|糸|t1=thread|扁|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to knit together a book (with thread).

|m=biān
|c=pin1

|md=piĕng

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[put]] in [[order]]; to [[arrange]]
# to [[weave]]; to [[knit]]; to [[plait]]
# to [[write]]; to [[compose]]; to [[author]]; to [[compile]]; to [[edit]]
# to [[connect]]; to [[join]]
# to [[make up]]; to [[fabricate]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[cord]] for [[tying]] [[slip]]s of [[inscribe]]d [[bamboo]] or [[wood]] together
# [[part]] of a [[book]]; [[book]]; [[volume]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
